website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 III compact camera earns Editors' Choice accolades because of its image quality and excellent EVF, even despite its high price.

customer_reviews.title: A gorgeous gem of a camera!
customer_reviews.text: As a photographic artist I want to capture every detail of a scene with complete clarity, right into the corners of the frame. My Nikon D800 DSLR does that beautifully, but it is useful to also have a pocket camera for those fleeting moments. The RX100 does this, and its RAW files let me make and sell stunning prints up to 50x75 inches. I bought the RX100 Mark 3 as a replacement for my Mark 1. The new lens is even sharper, and the slightly wider zoom suits me better (even if also slightly shorter). I also enjoy the RX100 for its build quality. Anyone who enjoy handling a gem-like mechanical device will love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: OleH

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable
customer_reviews.text: I spent several months researching and trying cameras. If you want an easy to carry camera that produces high level photos with endless creative possibilities, look no further. Given that this is an earlier version, the price is amazing too. This has largely replaced my DSLR now - the latter only really being used if i need to attach a long zoom lens or wish to get a high level of bokeh - (this camera will do bokeh but not nearly as well as a DSLR)

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the Camera and delivery
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the Camera and delivery. The camera has top ratings on a number of reviews available on the web and youtube. It definitely meets all of these expectations. Nothing negative to say about this product. All expectations met or exceeded. If you want a camera that is almost SLR quality but still fits in your pocket and costs a fraction of what an SLR + lens(es) costs, then this is the camera for you. Some tips on battery life: turn on airplane mode unless using NFC to transfer photos, turn down the flash exposure, you can also set the view screen to turn off with the dial button if using the view finder instead.

I didn't have to be. Superb quality of build, superb results. Am genuinely thrilled !! Am looking forward to experimenting a bit more with manual settings, as initial results have been good. But the auto settings, especially Scenes options, are jolly good.

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful camera.
customer_reviews.text: So much has already been written about this camera that there's little left to say. In my view it's peerless and the new viewfinder is so useful. I already own the MK1 of this model and the differences between these models justifies the purchase of the MK3. It's small enough to carry in a largish pocket and light enough to hang all day from a neck strap. Some ‘must have’ purchases for this camera are a Sony carry case and a Sony screen protector. These are not cheap items but given the price of the camera offer appropriate protection. Amazon's prices were competitive and delivery as always, on-time.
